question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. man in grey jacket
B. man in dark blue suit
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The depth relationship between the two men is ambiguous in the 2D image; both appear to be near the bus and at similar distances from the camera, making it difficult to determine which is further without a depth map.
